revised_title: Obituary of Frederick Augustus Dixey: A Pioneering Zoologist and Educator
tldr: Frederick Augustus Dixey was a prominent zoologist and educator who made significant contributions to the fields of entomology and education. He was a dedicated teacher, active in various scientific organizations, and played a crucial role in the development of the Hope Collections at Oxford University. Dixey's passion for science, music, and travel made him a well-loved figure among his colleagues and students.
